item.title: Mochi Poll
item.author: han@console.so (Han Ngo)
item.description: Requirement: Features: Poll Creation & Management: Set up a poll with specific questions and multiple options and a deadline. To finish creating a poll user must put some token in the poll which will be divided for all users vote for the poll. Generate a unique, sharable link upon poll completion. User Voting: The Access link to vote opens for everyone Require authentication using Discord, Twitter, or Wallet to vote. Users can only vote once, can change vote but cannot claim another reward.

item.title: Mochi Raycast Extension
item.author: han@console.so (Han Ngo)
item.description: Purpose: Create an alert channel for product team when emojis become invalid How: Create a cronjob (schedule Monday 2AM UTC) Get all emojis from table product_metadata_emojis Run a function to check (https://stackoverflow.com/questions/59808940/find-out-if-an-emoji-is-usable-in-discord-js) Alert channel #product-tracking Beautify output

item.title: Mochi Raycast Extension
item.author: han@console.so (Han Ngo)
item.description: Overview We want to create a new Slack version of Mochi tip bot Features for MVP /deposit /tip : @username, #channel : support integer and decimal : Cryptocurrencies symbol /withdraw /ticker Interface /deposit Help menu: when users enter only /deposit *private mode :moneybag: Deposit Tokens To deposit tokens into your Slack account, use the following command: /deposit <token> /deposit eth :one: Replace <token> with the token symbol you want to deposit.

item.title: Blockchain event calendar
item.author: han@console.so (Han Ngo)
item.description: 1/ Get data from: https://coinmarketcal.com/en/?page=3 2/ Render list of popular events, like: ETH, BTC, SOL, Token2049 …, support pagination 3/ Search event via keyword 4/ Users can submit their own event, with tag local and link to join, also alert a msg to mochi discord 5/ Expose API

item.title: Mochi BlackJack
item.author: han@console.so (Han Ngo)
item.description: Overview We are looking to develop a Blackjack game as a Discord bot. The bot will allow users to play Blackjack by interacting with it through various commands. Users will be required to transfer tokens from their wallet to the game’s wallet as a deposit to participate. The bot will manage the game logic, including dealing cards, calculating winnings, and transferring tokens back to the winner’s wallet. Below are the detailed requirements for this project.

item.title: Mochi Raycast Extension
item.author: han@console.so (Han Ngo)
item.description: Deadline: 5 May, 11:59 PM (Indian Standard Time) About the Bounty Mochi is a platform that allows Discord server owners to integrate trading supporting tools called Mochi APIs. Mochi APIs now provides Token and NFT Data query: User can query Token price, marketcap, and movement; NFT rarity and raking and sales which support the investment decision. Superteam is sponsoring a bounty for developers to use Mochi APIs to build a Raycast extension, which meets the following requirement: Users should be able to use the Raycast extension to query the token price, info and movement; convert token; and NFT rarity, ranking and sales.
